title: Arnold Bax - Sym No 4 - V Handley, BBC Philc (2003) [Philidor]
description:
A latterday Romantic, Arnold Bax lost ground in the 1950s, as the British critical establishment sought to promote more recent musical trends to gain ground abroad. Bax's rhapsodic genius and brilliant sense of orchestration eventually won him new audiences in the 1980s and 1990s. His Second Symphony was his first largescale work to achieve great popularity, and one of the few that carried over the period when his brand of British Romanticism was out of favor with the serialist establishment.


Bio and images included. You can find my uploads by searching on Philidor, or by checking this thread:
 
https://pirates-forum.org/Thread-Philidor-s-uploads--63895
